comment: Hard class due to a hard grading system. Would not take again.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Compared to her other classes this is a pretty straight forward and interactive class. You learn a lot about digital communication, social media, and more. There are two major assignments and multiple small assignments but they are enjoyable. Start early and you will be able to manage your time/do well.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. McGrath is a great professor who responds fast to emails, is understanding, and willing to help. I believe this course was new this semester and it was very different and interesting to me. There is about two major assignments and multiple little assignments (but they contribute to the big assignments). Be prepared to write/ discuss nature.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. McGrath is a solid choice I am taking her again in the spring! Only 3 major assignments and some discussions there is a lot of helpful reading material and some extra credit. She responds fast to emails and was willing to review my assignments and provide me with feedback before I submitted my final work.

I wish I can re-take this class for a better grade, if I put more effort I would of. I took this course as part of related course for my major. Learned MLA format and the usage of Chicago Style the first half of the semester. The second half focus on in more depth of the careers of editing and there is a copy editing exam to be prepared.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: She's fantastic! She will always answer your questions, she gives great feedback on your projects, and as long as you follow her detailed rubrics, you're going to get an A. Definitely recommend her class! I feel like I've learned a lot.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I can appreciate a well organized professor. The class is structured well and the assignments are real life workplace tasks. I love that she not only grades in a timely fashion, but she also provides helpful feedback and sometimes she even lets you correct your work for a better grade!  I would take her class again.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: I took her online. Listen. Just do the work and you will be fine. She's very understanding and the work can be a little tedious, but it's not hard. I missed a deadline due to my focus being on Hurricane Irma stuff. I just emailed her to explain and she let me do it for full credit. JUST DO THE WORK!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: I misread a few of her assignments, and she was nice enough for me to redo them. She is great professor who communicates well regardless that the course is online--I received an email back from her in a matter of hours. I would take her again.

Dr. McGrath is really nice, helpful, and cares about students doing well. Overall a fair grader, just make sure to proofread your writing for grammatical errors. The book was occasionally mentioned in class but you don't need it. She grades objectively in what can be a subjective field, so I found her to be pretty rock solid. Recommended professor.
One of the best professors. Excellent teacher. Dedicated. Prepared. Knowledgeable and professional. Goes above and beyond.
Lovely person! Lovely professor! Highly recommend!
For being an online instructor, she was very personable, helpful, and timely in critiquing work. I'd recommend this class for anyone interested in writing, regardless of what your sole focus may be.
Exceptional.
Excellent. Best professor ever. Super mind stretcher.

This professor is awesome! I took her for an online digital writing class. She is organized, helpful, and communicative. She's also really sweet and encouraging. I'm a graduating senior, and I must say she is by far one of the best I've had at KSU.

Took this class online - so easy! 3 discussion groups, 3 peer review groups, and 3 essays spread out over the semester make up your grade.  You DO have to do them by specific times, and she does look for more than just "i agree!" but if you read and participate you should do fine.  Best online class I've taken!

ONLINE. Take this class online. So easy. I loved this online class. Dr. McGrath assigned a few assignments and one exam. The big part of our grades were a manual we wrote. Easy!  Does have students in groups for easier discussions, etc, but does not penalize you if no one else participates. GREAT class! Would definitely take her again!

Great teacher! I took an online class with her and I learned a lot. The assignments were interesting and plentiful. I fell behind due to an emergency and she was extremely helpful and allowed me to catch up. I recommend her, especially if you're up for a challenge and enjoy the subject.
Dr.McGrath is very young and nice. I took an online class with her and she was kinda of tough grading. The lectures are boring and the web project is a pain. overall, not bad.
I just took an online class. She was very organized. Very fair. I would definitely take her classes again. I think she is very knowledgeable about the material she teaches.

she is nice and will help you if you need it. her class is boring. she talks the whole time. the class actually counted how many times she said the word, "right". she gives like 3 impossible quizes and we got HW a lot. fair essay grader.
No Comments

Best online class I have ever taken!!!!  She should lecture other professors on the "Recipe" for an organized and educational online course.  She was tough and amazingly helpful.  I grew tremendously in my writing skills.
